Home of the b4z project

11 May 2014

Hey there! Welcome here. We are a small IT Team called b4z and our main goal is to do something simple and useful. We are planning to involve some kind of desktop and mobile based web & software projects.

We hope you enjoy all of our finely crafted products. It's all for you! Please let us know what you think and don't hesitate to contact us. Yours feedback is extremely important for us so please keep 'em coming!
